attributes.action: Get rid of daily standing charges on gas and electric they are unfair
attributes.additional_details: It will help the consumers manage paying there bills and this is unfair as when u don't use gas and electric there shouldn't be a charge for having a supply going into a premises as especially when ur away from the property
attributes.background: Fuel companies are making extortionate profits from daily charges they should be abolished as when ur on holiday we don't use fuels we shouldn't have to pay these charges need all of the help to reduce bills and there unfair. These charges are a excuse for companies to make profits.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for energy providers.

You can find out more about standing charges here: https://www.energyhelpline.com/help/what-are-unit-rates-and-standing-charges
